H0.text: Which Czech tennis player knocked out Andy Murray in the fourth round of the Men's Singles at the French Open. Jiří Veselý

H1.text: Which Czech tennis player knocked out Andy Murray in the fourth round of the Men's Singles at the French Open. Lukáš Rosol

H2.text: Which Czech tennis player knocked out Andy Murray in the fourth round of the Men's Singles at the French Open. Radek Štěpánek

H3.text: Which Czech tennis player knocked out Andy Murray in the fourth round of the Men's Singles at the French Open. Berdych

A4.text: In the 2010 French Open, Berdych defeated No. 4 Andy Murray in the fourth round in straight sets.
